node.title: About us
node.intro: We're committed to people living as valued citizens, making their own decisions, developing their abilities and growing in their relationships.
node.subtitle: What We Stand For

childMarkdownRemark.html:
You’re the one in charge. We work with you as a team to develop and provide the services you really need so that you’ll be able to make the most of your funding.

We’re committed to people making their own decisions, developing their abilities and growing in their relationships.

It’s important you feel comfortable letting us into your home and we want to fit seamlessly into your life. For instance, we don’t wear uniforms and we don’t have branded cars. And that’s the way we like it.

We work with you and your family to live at home for as long as you wish. Living in your own home means things are familiar and you are part of the community. You know the area, the shops the people and you belong. Living in your own home means you have your independence
childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: You’re the one in charge. We work with you as a team to develop and provide the…

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Everyone is different, and whether it’s getting more help around the house, heading to appointments, personal care or connecting you to your community, we work with you to get the mix right so you can live in your home.

Together we’ll develop a plan that you own, control and can change as your life changes. There may be times when you need more aged care support and times when you need less – it’s good to know we’re there if you need us; a phone call away.

Throughout, we listen to you and the people who are important to you. You guide us in what’s important and how you want your supports provided.

Download our latest At Home Aged Care Package Price List.

Video: George and Penny share how they continue to pursue what’s important to them in their golden years.
